price: Nokorε sε, obia ͻbεba ne Wura Nyankopͻn hͻ na ͻyε bͻneεni no, nokorε sε Amane hunu gya no wͻ hͻ ma no. Onnwu wᴐ egya no mu, na onya nkwa nso.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ مَن يَأۡتِ رَبَّهُۥ مُجۡرِمٗا فَإِنَّ لَهُۥ جَهَنَّمَ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحۡيَىٰ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: innahu man yati rabbahu muj'riman fa-inna lahu jahannama lā yamūtu fīhā walā yaḥyā
